content.rendered:
Last updated on: 01/07/21

About ANA Airline:
All Nippon Airways （ANA） is the largest airline in Japan by revenues and passenger numbers. Founded in 1952, ANA flies today on 83 international routes and 116 domestic routes. The ANA group has 35,000 employees and a fleet of about 250 aircraft. In FY2015, it carried 50.8 million passengers and generated revenues of 1.79 trillion Japanese yen. ANA has been a member of Star Alliance since 1999, and has joint-ventures with United Airlines on trans-Pacific and Asia routes, and with Lufthansa, Swiss International Airlines and Austrian Airlines on Japan-Europe routes. Its Frequent Flyer Program, ANA Mileage Club, has more than 26 million members. ANA was voted Airline of the Year for 2013 by Air Transport World Magazine, and in 2015 was awarded five stars for the fourth consecutive year by the world’s leading Airline and Airport review site, SKYTRAX. ANA is the launch customer and biggest operator of the Boeing 787 Dreamliner.

  ANA Airline Reservations Office Address:
Phnom Penh Office: Level 7, Unit 11 Vattanac Capital
No. 66, Preah Monivong Blvd
Sangkat Wat Phnom
Khan Daun Penh
Phnom Penh
Cambodia

General Inquiries Tel: 023-963-617 / 023-963-618 (Charged)

Office Hours: 08:00AM – 12:00PM, 01:00PM – 05:00PM (Except weekends or national holidays)

Calling from outside of Cambodia : +855-23-963-617, +855-23-963-618 (International call charges will apply).

ANA airlines Official Website: http://www.ana.co.jp/

ANA airlines Online Check-in: https://www.ana.co.jp/en/sg/travel-information/online-check-in/

ANA Airlines Baggage Allowance

For baggage related inquiries such as Items left behind, Lost baggage, damaged or delayed baggage, please visit ANA Airlines – Airport Lost and Found, Delayed, Damaged Baggage

ANA International Reservation and Customer Service Center:

Call within Japan: 0570-029-333 (Fixed rate within Japan)
Phone: 03-6741-6685 (Toll number)

Operator hours: International (Including Award Tickets) 8:00 – 19:00, 22:00 – 8:00 (open year around)

* Reception hours might be changed depending on circumstances.

ANA Mileage Club:

Phone: 023-963-617 / 023-963-618 (Charged, open daily, 24 hours)*1
When your call does not connect to the above number, please call the number below.

+81-3-4332-6872* (charged, open daily, 24 hours)*1
* Charges for international call to Japan will apply.

Business Hours: 8.00 – 19.00; 22.00 – 8.00 (open year around)

ANA Disability Desk:

Calling from outside Japan: Dial the country code 81 and the number (omit the 0 if the number starts with 0).
Within Japan: 0120-029-377 (toll-free, open 4:00 p.m. – 0:00 a.m. PST)
Fax: 0120-029-366

When your call does not connect to the above number, please call the number below. International call charges will apply.
Phone: 0570-029-377 (charged, open 4:00 p.m. – 0:00 a.m. PST)
Phone: 03-6741-8900 (charged, open 4:00 p.m. – 0:00 a.m. PST)
Fax: 03-6741-8710

ANA Airport Support Inquiries:
Inquiries from within Japan: 9:00 to 18:00 (available year round)
Call Handling System: 0570-029-701 (fixed rate from anywhere in Japan)
Call: 03-6741-8702 (Charged number)
Dial a number above and select “2” when the automated voice system is prompted.

*If you need to make an inquiry outside of the business hours of 9:00 to 18:00, please contact the International Reservation(Japan site only) and Customer Service Center.

Near-by Airports: Siem Reap-Angkor International Airport, Phnom Penh International Airport, Buriram Airport

Attractions in Cambodia: Angkor Wat, Royal Palace, Tonle Sap

List of ANA Airways Offices

Queries handled by ANA Customer care:
Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Lost and Found, ANA mileage club.

Is there any problem with reaching the ANA Airline Reservations Office Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the ANA Airline Reservations Office in Cambodia: (click on the stars below)
